name: Furogo
description:
Creator:
Pixel art, programming and music
Joel Maximiano dos Santos

Furogo

Gameplay Instructions

Movements as human:

<- and ->

Key bind to transform into bird:

R (press again to return to human form.)

Key bind to transform into mole:

E (press again to return to human form.)

(You cannot transform from one animal to another, must always return to human form first.)

Movements as bird:

<- /\ -> \/

Attack:

Left Shift

Movements as mole:

<- /\ -> \/

Which Engine version did you use to create your entry?
Unreal Engine 5

Plot:

When adulthood has been reached, young warriors must prove worthy of being called Shakai as they pass the challenges of Terralta.

But unlike the great warriors that have powerful spirits from the land of Air, Algrie has inherited the two weakest spirits and has no intention of greatness, as his goal of joining the tournament is to find his childhood friend.
